title: Schematics for Mac MIni...?
message:
Hi everyone, I have searched everywhere online the schematic for Mac Mini.. It seems very difficult.

does anyone have any idea where I can get one? Will be rather difficult to troubleshoot the Mac Mini without a schematic.

The issue at hand: the Mac Mini, starts and then shuts off. Could this be a problem due to bad GPU?

Thanks for feedbacks

title: Schematics for Mac MIni...?
message: This probably isn't the best place to request schematics.
